ygData.subject: Re: Lets Get Dangerous !

Motormaster's internal repairs could probably repair him by now, yeah.


::Killfest/EndBringer/The CATs/Scyther/Incarcinator::

Killfest exits the shuttle behind Motormaster, two boosters emerging 
from his back to act as a propulsion system. The boosters weren't 
strong enough to be any good in earth gravity, but they were perfect 
for space.

He watches Astroblast avoid the LA2, seeing Koj on top of it. Aiming 
his EMP cannon, he fires at Koj.

"What exactly are we looking for here?" he asks Motormaster as he 
fires again.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Koj's eyes widen in surprise as an EMP shot hits his feet, making him 
lose the grip on the LA2 and fall off. He spins around, heading for 
Killfest with his sword ready.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
EndBringer exits behind Killfest, similar boosters emerging from his 
back, below his tentacles. Two missile launchers flip out of his 
shoulders, firing at Koj. Koj ducks under, but the missiles circle 
back, heading for their target again.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
The LA2 shakes as shots hit the top and sides of it, blowing off a 
few panels.

"Stay in the ship, Dark, I'm going out to fight," Liono tells his 
brother, opening a hatch and jumping out, firing three shots at 
Motormaster.

With the LA2's top smoking from the hit, Dark aims the cannons, 
firing at Astroblast again.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
The stasis pods containing Key, Riona, and BlueStinger exit the 
atmosphere, heading for the Ark.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
With a flash, Scyther's shuttle exits transwarp, several dozen miles 
away from the Ark. He checks the scanners, seeing that Killfest was 
in a battle nearby.

"Ah, it seems like we get our first battle," he says to the two other 
bots in the shuttle while he manuevers it closer to the Ark.

Incarcinator, one of the other bots in the shuttle with Scyther, 
stands up. He was about a dozen feet tall, and the material that his 
body consisted of was translucent, so he was a bit seethrough. He 
smiles. "Excellent. Out of prison and already slaggin' bots!"

Incarcinator takes out a large rifle from his back compartment. The 
rifle was a mean looking weapon, with many attachments on it. It was 
made of the same material as Incarcinator. With a silent command from 
the bot, Incarcinator's armor slowly turns completely black. He waits 
for them to get to the battle.




--- In nbwrpg@y..., Robert Dahl <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> OOC: Yanshosh, would Motormaster's wounds be healed yet? I'm not 
sure.
> 
> BIC:
> Motormaster leaps out of the shuttle into nothingness of space, and
> manuvers himself around to fire on the attacking ship. He pulls the 
trigger
> twice as he opens his commlink. "You better not leave me out here 
after the
> fight Astroblast. Or I might drift away from earth." He states, 
more of a
> command than a joke.
